metadata.title: CVE-2012-4459 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Integer overflow in the qpid::framing::Buffer::checkAvailable function inApache Qpid 0.20 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (crash) via a crafted message, which triggers an out-of-boundsread.

criterions.comment: qpid-cpp package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
